FuncDef: The reset aaa online-fail-record dhcp statistics command clears statistics about user login failures.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear statistics about user login failures, run the reset aaa online-fail-record dhcp statistics command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
Login failure records cannot be restored after they are cleared. Exercise caution when running the reset command.
